title: ABC Learning Design and Interactive Learning Type Application Strategies for Science Online Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Design and analysis of interactive online science courses in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, focusing on the impact of learning styles.

learning_goals: Learners can design a 4-week science course optimized for mobile environments by applying the ABC (Activity-Based Curriculum) learning design model.
Learners can design activity sequences utilizing Laurillardâ€™s six types of learning (acquisition, inquiry, discussion, practice, collaboration, production).
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of learning type placement by analyzing course completion rates, satisfaction, and engagement data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
